integral_image_tools package¶

Submodules¶

integral_image_tools.integral_image module¶

Functions for calculating integral image and sum of pixels of a rectangle with given border points

integral_image_tools.integral_image.integral_view(image: list[list[int]]) → list[list[int]]¶

Calculates matrix of integral image for “image”

Args:

image (list[list[int]]): matrix of integers from 0 to 255

Returns:

list[list[int]]: matrix of integral image

integral_image_tools.integral_image.rect_sum(rect: list[list[int]], x1: int, y1: int, x2: int, y2: int) → int¶

Calculates sum of pixels of a rectangle within given borders Args:

rect (list[list[int]]): matrix of integers x1 (int): top left border X coordinate y1 (int): top left border Y coordinate x2 (int): bottom right X coordinate y2 (int): bottom right Y coordinate

Returns:

int: sum of pixels

integral_image_tools.matrix_generator module¶

Function for generating matrix

integral_image_tools.matrix_generator.generate() → list[list[int]]¶

Generates matrix of numbers (0-255) with 2..15 rows and 2..15 columns Returns:

list[list[int]]: matrix
